topics.body:
For some reason the mention of repo made me remember a few years back my tv receiver didn't work so I would go to sleep to DVDs playing in my ps2
Multiple times I woke up to "this":http://youtu.be/WazjFa2_7Vw on loop on the dvd menu and it was friggin jammin
topics.author: 500b587e7f123b1f230014a9

topics.body:
"@Kaz":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/558edc18636872477a00029a#post_558edc18636872477a00029a
its a decent start into the world of music. its a decent Ambient track that i could see it being used in some sci-fi fantasy type of film where the protagonist is just walking through an enchanted forest of some sorts. i can hear quite well that youre using softsynths to make this, im gonna guess FM8 and/or Absynth were used for this.

overall its a good starting place but nothing more than that as of now
